医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CRISPR-Cas9 在对抗蚊媒疾病中的作用宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。随着全球变暖的加剧，蚊子活动区域不断扩大，加上自然环境的变化和杀虫剂的滥用，进一步增强了蚊子的抵抗力，使世界面临蚊媒疾病的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/The-role-of-CRISPR-Cas9-in-combating-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/The-role-of-CRISPR-Cas9-in-combating-mosquito-borne-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34bbd246-ce9e-43b2-a9f7-d0fa240a8449 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:21:29 -0400 The role of CRISPR-Cas9 in combating mosquito-borne diseases
工作场所化学品风险评估新建议发布DFG 工作区域化学物质健康危害调查常设参议院委员会现已发布其关于工作场所使用物质风险评估的最新研究建议的英文版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-recommendations-for-workplace-chemical-risk-assessment-published.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-recommendations-for-workplace-chemical-risk-assessment-published.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a89936f1-292c-4bac-8da1-de8379b3b91c Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:14:32 -0400 New recommendations for workplace chemical risk assessment published
新闻-医疗宣布与世界孤儿药大会合作在欧洲世界孤儿药大会上与 2000 多名与会者互动，重点关注基因治疗和罕见疾病治疗进展策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/News-Medical-announces-partnership-with-World-Orphan-Drug-Congress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/News-Medical-announces-partnership-with-World-Orphan-Drug-Congress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aeebd6d-5c22-4bbd-a96f-6bfcfcc51cf6 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:07:00 -0400 News-Medical announces partnership with World Orphan Drug Congress
民意调查显示，近一半的老年人计划接种更新的 COVID-19 疫苗新更新的 COVID-19 疫苗刚刚抵达全国药房和诊所，一项新的民意调查显示，近一半 50 岁及以上的人计划接种该疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Nearly-half-of-people-older-adults-plan-to-get-the-updated-COVID-19-vaccine-poll-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Nearly-half-of-people-older-adults-plan-to-get-the-updated-COVID-19-vaccine-poll-suggests.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a21709f-c58d-4909-bd55-8f1a041969d8 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 09:28:33 -0400 Nearly half of people older adults plan to get the updated COVID-19 vaccine, poll suggests
增强的 TnpB 蛋白为基因编辑提供了新的可能性CRISPR-Cas 广泛用于研究和医学领域，用于编辑、插入、删除或调节生物体中的基因。 TnpB 是这种著名的“基因剪刀”的祖先，但它要小得多，因此更容易转运到细胞中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Enhanced-TnpB- Protein-offers-new-possibilities-for-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Enhanced-TnpB- Protein-offers-new-possibilities-for-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=338bf06d-ed06-4712-9749-ff106fbf2a10 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 09:23:31 -0400 Enhanced TnpB protein offers new possibilities for gene editing
发现与严重霍乱症状相关的关键遗传因素专家们使用尖端的计算方法来发现导致霍乱细菌如此危险的遗传因素，这可能是预防这种致命疾病的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Key-genic-factors-linked-to-severe-cholera-symptoms-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Key-genic-factors-linked-to-severe-cholera-symptoms-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1ef8745-7e21-4ce7-a285-50f97714bb53 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 08:48:18 -0400 Key genetic factors linked to severe cholera symptoms discovered
研究发现与智力障碍相关的新遗传变异西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员在《自然遗传学》杂志上发表了一项关键研究（DOI：10.1038/s41588-024-01917-1），揭示了一种与智力能力和教育成果相关的新型遗传变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-uncovers-novel-genic-variant-linked-with-intellectual-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-uncovers-novel-genic-variant-linked-with-intellectual-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21d4a9a2-d779-402f-9a8d-8bca6e9ae3f3 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 08:31:58 -0400 Study uncovers novel genetic variant associated with intellectual disability
Broken String Biosciences 任命 Laurence Reid 和 Brad Crutchfield 为其董事会成员Broken String Biosciences 与 Laurence Reid 和 Brad Crutchfield 一起增强了其领导团队，旨在彻底改变细胞和基因疗法的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Broken-String-Biosciences-appoints-Laurence-Reid-and-Brad-Crutchfield-to-its-Board-of-Directors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Broken-String-Biosciences-appoints-Laurence-Reid-and-Brad-Crutchfield-to-its-Board-of-Directors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec7cd902-d4af-47b2-9b21-5cebcf26fddc Mon, 23 Sep 2024 08:17:00 -0400 Broken String Biosciences appoints Laurence Reid and Brad Crutchfield to its Board of Directors
化疗与老年癌症幸存者心血管风险增加有关一项基于临床试验数据的研究发现，老年癌症幸存者中风、心脏病和因心力衰竭住院的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Chemotherapy-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risks-in-older-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Chemotherapy-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-risks-in-older-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb102285-8803-4e63-a7ab-aab157117a10 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 07:33:20 -0400 Chemotherapy linked to increased cardiovascular risks in older cancer survivors
许多荷兰精英运动员和教练面临着与运动相关的严重困扰近四分之三的荷兰精英运动员和百分之四十的教练表示存在与运动相关的困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Many-Dutch-elite-athletes-and-coaches-face-high-levels-of-sport-lated-distress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Many-Dutch-elite-athletes-and-coaches-face-high-levels-of-sport-lated-distress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e6a543e-64a2-427b-8a94-f01d1ad9cd6e Mon, 23 Sep 2024 07:26:18 -0400 Many Dutch elite athletes and coaches face high levels of sport-related distress
